sulu_category.name: Name
sulu_activity.text.categories.moved: {userFullName} has moved the category "{resourceTitle}" from "{context_previousParentTitle}" to "{context_newParentTitle}"
sulu_activity.text.categories.translatio: {userFullName} has added a translation "{resourceLocale}" to the category "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.text.categories.keyword_ad: {userFullName} has added the keyword "{context_keywordTitle}" to the category "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.text.categories.keyword_mo: {userFullName} has changed the keyword "{context_keywordTitle}" of the category "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.text.categories.keyword_re: {userFullName} has removed the keyword "{context_keywordTitle}" from the category "{resourceTitle}"
